# A dedicated wildlife ecologist and geospatial scientist...

Hello, my name is **Ben Tjepkes** and this is my online portfolio showcasing my professional and creative projects. I am a graduate student at the University of Missouri in the Department of Geography where I use a variety of data science and geospatial tools to conduct research in wildlife ecology and biogeography. Thank you for stopping by!

```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Lazy Loading Divs</title>
    <style>
        <!-- body { -->
        <!--     font-family: Arial, sans-serif; -->
        <!--     margin: 0; -->
        <!--     padding: 0; -->
        <!-- } -->
        .container {
            width: 100%;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        .lazy-div {
            display: flex;
            flex: 0 0 calc(50% - 5px);
            height: 220px;
            margin: 0 0;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-size: 24px;
            color: #aaa;
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center center;
            transition: background-color 2s, color 0.5s;
            
            p {
            background: black;
            height: fit-content;
            padding: 0 8px;
            margin: 20px auto auto 0;
            font-size: 16px;
            border-left: solid 4px #1f883d;
              }
        }
        .lazy-div.loaded {
            background-color: #4caf50;
            color: #fff;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container column-page">
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://images-assets.nasa.gov/image/KSC-05pd2448/KSC-05pd2448~medium.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;">
        <p>Wildlife Ecology</p>
        </div>
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://www.nasa.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/uralriver-flood-oli2-20240413-lrg.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;"><p>Remote Sensing</p></div>
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7b1d80_c4b29196baa54f69b0caf83f5d56cb63~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_560,h_300,fp_0.50_0.50,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/7b1d80_c4b29196baa54f69b0caf83f5d56cb63~mv2.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;"><p>Conservation GIS</p></div>
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://zubrod-eds.de/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Heart_cropped.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;"><p>Environmental Data Science</p></div>
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://www.nasa.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/iss070e042565-lrg.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;"><p>Biogeography</p></div>
        <div class="lazy-div" style="background-image: url('https://images-assets.nasa.gov/image/05pd1402/05pd1402~medium.jpg'); background-color: #001a17;"><p>Climate Science</p></div>
    </div>
    
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const lazyDivs = document.querySelectorAll('.lazy-div');

            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.classList.add('loaded');
                        observer.unobserve(entry.target);
                    }
                });
            }, {
                threshold: 0.1
            });

            lazyDivs.forEach(div => {
                observer.observe(div);
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
</html>
```
